actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to expand and enhance the Little Bighorn Battlefield National Monument.
short_title: Little Bighorn Battlefield National Monument Enhancement Act of 2001

summary.text: Little Bighorn Battlefield National Monument Enhancement Act of 2001 - Establishes the Little Bighorn Battlefield National Monument Enhancement Committee to advise the Secretary of the Interior to ensure that the Monument, its resources, and landscape are sensitive to the history being portrayed and artistically commendable.Establishes in the Treasury the Little Bighorn Battlefield National Monument Enhancement Fund.

titles.title: Little Bighorn Battlefield National Monument Enhancement Act of 2001
A bill to expand and enhance the Little Bighorn Battlefield National Monument.
